communityDevelopment.title: COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
communityDevelopment.description: Expand user network, attract investors to develop the ecosystem.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.intro: This is a pioneering finance-advertising platform connecting Users and Businesses through USDT staking mechanisms and completing advertising viewing tasks. Unlike traditional investment models, we create real value from users' ad viewing behavior across multiple devices simultaneously to deliver sustainable returns. The platform provides real device farms for users to rent, bringing high efficiency in ad views and saving time for participants.

marketProblems.title: Current Market Problems
marketProblems.item1: Passive income is difficult to access - Traditional investment channels require large capital and specialized knowledge
marketProblems.item2: Ineffective advertising - Businesses pay high costs but don't reach the right audience that is genuinely interested
marketProblems.item3: Lack of transparency - Users don't know where the real income comes from to pay participants for their work

solution.title: AdsWorld Solution
solution.item1: Dual income - Profits from both USDT staking and completing ad viewing tasks
solution.item2: Real value - Businesses reach real customers, increasing traffic for businesses, users get paid for the value they create
solution.item3: Multi-layered security - KYC, data encryption, and mobile app anti-spam protection
solution.item4: Spread community - 2-level referral system creates organic growth momentum and sustainable ecosystem

step1.title: Step 1: Registration & KYC
step1.item2: Identity verification (KYC) to prevent spam and fraud

step3.title: Step 3: Complete Tasks
step3.item1: Use AdsWorld app to watch ad videos

step4.title: Step 4: Receive Rewards
step4.item2: Flexible withdrawal with first 5 times free

section3.title: 3. Staking & Task System

table.devices: Number of devices supporting simultaneous viewing

penalty.title: 3.2. Incomplete Task Mechanism
penalty.description: Users who purchase a package but don't watch ads will lose that day's interest.
penalty.example: Example: 30-day package only completed 28 days → lose 1%/20% interest (0.5% / 1 day)

section3.maxParticipationNote: The maximum amount one person can participate is 3,500USDT to ensure fairness and expansion of participants, increasing value for the platform. If an individual participates with too large an amount, it will unbalance the volume of real traffic participating in the platform

commission.title: 5.1. Referral Commission
commission.description: Transaction commission: You will receive a % commission from the USDT amount of users you invite to participate
commission.level1: Receive 25% from Level 1 user deposit amount (directly below you)
commission.level2: Receive 4% from Level 2 user deposit amount (referred by Level 1)
commission.totalCommissionNote: Total commission income up to 15% of the staking amount of each newly invited person

milestones.title: 5.2. Referral Milestone Rewards exclusively for influential partners
milestones.condition: Condition: Invited person must deposit at least once, complete work once, and complete KYC

revenue.title: 6.1. Multi-Channel Revenue
revenue.item1: Businesses pay fees for each quality video view
revenue.item2: Users filtered through KYC → high-value quality

security.title: 7.1. Multi-Layer Security
security.item1: KYC/AML: Identity verification for all users
security.item3: Mobile application: Anti-spam tools and automation prevention

phase1.title: Phase 1: Launch (Q1/2025)
phase1.item3: Launch mobile app on CH Play & TestFlight

section9.title: 9. Core Message
section9.message: We are not just an investment platform - we create an ecosystem where every action creates real value. Users earn income from their attention, businesses reach quality customers, and the entire community develops sustainably together.

responsibility.title: Responsibilities and Rights
responsibility.description: As a bridge between advertisers and users, we disclaim all responsibility related to product quality, assets, or investment results. Customers need to carefully consider the risks before making decisions.

section11.title: 11. Conclusion
section11.paragraph1: We represent the next generation of finance combined with digital advertising. With a transparent business model, advanced security technology, and long-term vision, we are committed to delivering sustainable passive income solutions for the global community.
section11.paragraph2: Join us on the journey to create the future of decentralized finance!

footer.note: This document may be updated according to each development phase of the project. The latest version will be published on the official website.
